summary.name: Hotel Rex Milano
summary.tagline: 3-star hotel with restaurant, near Fondazione Prada

items.text: Buffet breakfast (surcharge) each morning 7 AMâ€“9:30 AM

editorial.title: Milan
content: Hotel Rex Milano is located in Vigentino, a neighborhood in Milan, and is in a shopping district and next to a golf course. Fondazione Prada and Galleria Emi Fontana are cultural highlights, and some of the area's notable landmarks include Santa Maria Annunciata in Chiesa Rossa and Palazzina Liberty. Looking to enjoy an event or a game while in town? See what's going on at Mediolanum Forum. Spend some time exploring the area's activities, including outlet shopping.
